Below is Chris's email. The materials we sent are attached. We are happy to discuss whenever best for you both. Thanks! 
From: Christian Everdell • 
Sent: Monday, October 26, 2020 1:59 AM 
To: (USANYS) a; Mark S. Cohen 
<

Menninger a>. Jeff Pagliuca Bobbi 
Sternheim

Subject: RE: United States v. Maxwell 
Thank you, M. 
We request unredacted copies of these reports and the notes. Please let us know why you think these redactions are 
warranted given the protective order. 
Regards, 
Chris
